title: MicroStrategy CEO on Bitcoin Surge
itunes:title: MicroStrategy CEO on Bitcoin Surge
description:
Michael Saylor, CEO at MicroStrategy, and Bloomberg Intelligence Commodity Strategist Mike McGlone discuss the recent surge in Bitcoin.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
